Directed by Fernando Frias. Nacho Vigalondo. Bert. Bertie. Andrew DeYoung. Taika Waititi.

Written by David Jenkins. David Jenkins. Eliza JimÃ©nez Cossio. Eliza JimÃ©nez Cossio. Zayre Ferrer. Zayre Ferrer. William Meny. Alyssa Lane. John Mahone. Simone Nathan. Alex J. Sherman. Adam Stein. Yvonne Zima.

Cast  Joel Fry( Frenchie 1) . Samson Kayo( Oluwande 1) . Nathan Foad( Lucius 1) . Matthew Maher( Black Pete 1) . Kristian Nairn( Wee John Feeney ) . Samba Schutte( Roach ) . Ewen Bremner( Buttons ) . Con O’Neill( Izzy Hands ) . Vico Ortiz( Jim ) . Taika Waititi( Blackbeard ) . Nat Faxon( The Swede ) . Rory Kinnear( Admiral Chauncey Badmin/epton ) . Guz Khan( Ivan ) . David Fane( Fang ) . Eden Grace Redfield( Alma Bonnet ) . William Barber-Holler( Louis Bonnet ) . Claudia O’Doherty( Mary Bonnet ) . Leslie Jones( Spanish Jackie ) . Connor Barrett( Officer Hornberry ) . Boris McGiver( Father Bonnet ) . Fred Armisen( Geraldo ) . Michael Crane( Officer Wellington ) . Theo Darby( Young Stede ) . Angus Sampson( KIng George I ) . Nick Kroll( Gabriel ) . Simone Kessell( Mother Teach ) . Kristen Schaal( Antoinette ) . Kristen Johnston( The Widow Evelyn Higgins ) . Mateo Gallegos( Young Edward Teach ) . Damien Gerard( Father Teach ) . Carlos Arellano( El Otro ) . Ashna Sharan( The Widow Ellen Conroy ) . Christian Lagadec( Well-Heeled Investor ) . Jeff Lorch( French Merchant Ship Captain ) . Cornelius Peter( Well-Heeled Investor ) . Yvonne Zima( Fleur de Maquis ) . Maarten Simons( Partner ) . Jordan Feldman( Heavily Made-Up Man ) . Nancy Lantis( Wealthy Woman ) . Selenis Leyva( The Nun ) . Brian Gattas( Siegfried ) . Will Arnett( Calico Jack ) . Jonathan Medina( Papa JimÃ©nez ) . Christopher Corbin( Creepy Pirate ) . Dan Considine( Ghoulish Man ) . Allyson Juliette( Young Bonifacia ) . Ted Heyck( Elderly Fisherman ) . Gary Farmer( Chief Mabo ) . Pedro Lopez( Elderly Fisherman ) . Pingi Moli( Card Player ) . Enrique Renaldo( Local Peasant ) . Tim Heidecker( Doug ) . Pete Gardner( Dutch Captain ) . Fernando Frias( Alfeo de La Vaca ) . Ronnie Clark( Card Player ) . Domin/epic Burgess( Jeffrey ) . David Jenkins( Officer Shaw ) . Roslyn Gentle( Mother Bonnet ) . Francesco Toby( Jean Luc ) . Nacho Vigalondo( El Capitan ) . Cerris Morgan-Moyer( Victoria Archer ) . Asher Bishop( Rowboat Bully ) . Hugo Pierre Martin( Haughty Attendant ) . Daniel Olson( French Warship Captain ) . Noah James Butler( Dutch Sailor ) . Pancho Cardena( Seedy Drunk ) . Devon Stewart( Abshir ) . Benton Jennings( Priest ) . Jamie Nations( Guard ) . James Barrington( Sailor ) . Nico GalÃ¡n( Spanish First Mate ) . David Piggott( Sailor ) . Marcelo Olivas( Seedy Drunk ) . Toneey Acevedo( Tribal Elder ) . Ian Alda( Clark Clerkwell ) . Iain Morris( English Seaman ) . Arthur RedCloud( Mabo Warrior ) . Sergio Lanza( Spanish Captain ) . Luke Marinkovich( English Seaman ) . Mark Prendergast( Court Scribe ) . Ted Barton( Well-Heeled Investor ) . HoNu Asuncion( Mabo Warrior ) . Jenna Carley( Eugenia ) . Adam Stein( Middle-Aged Man ) . Rawle D. Lewis( Piano Worker ) . Edward Fletcher( Eugenia’s Husband ) . Joberde Metellus( Piano Worker ) . Arthur Joseph( Spanish Jackie Husband #2 (uncredited) ) . Michael Heidemann( English Seaman (uncredited) )

Language English.

Producers Todd King. Allen Marshall Palmer. Will Weiske. Taika Waititi. Garrett Basch. Dan Halsted. David Jenkins. Susan Parker.

Production Dive. HBO Max.

 

Number of Seasons 2

Number of Episodes 11

Status OnGoing (2022–)
